basics.name: Dario Miñones
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a Software Engineer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. I'm a self-starter, highly enthusiastic and motivated. I love to create great software using agile methodologies and being part of a great team that helps me to grow up professionally and personally.

work.summary: Cactus is a small software agency that builds web apps,mobile apps and websites for a wide range of clients.  My role as the CTO is to develop strategies and leverage technologies to build great products. I do lead the engineering team and colaborate in our sales flow.
highlights: Evaluate and identify appropriate technology platforms (including web application frameworks and the deployment stack) for delivering the company’s services.
Lead the team to do better software by helping to build progressive learning culture.
Establish a predictable model of envisioning, designing and developing products.

work.summary: Developing iOS/Android apps and Web apps from the scratch, from the client requirements, to the app store interacting with other members of the team such as designers and the client. Leading some projects involving other developers and designers to do so. I've done a wide range of apps, from games to localization apps involving maps, complex animations and REST APi's.
highlights: iOS localization related apps involving maps, local storage (Core Data), REST API interaction and API Development
iOS Games, including level downloads, In-App purchases

work.summary: Electronic Repair Company. Repairing a wide range of devices such as Notebooks, P.O.S, Printers, etc.

volunteer.organization: Universidad de Buenos Aires / Boise University
